Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Interface AsyncRequestFuture

All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncRequestFutureImpl
@Private public interface AsyncRequestFuture
The context used to wait for results from one submit call. If submit call is made with needResults false, results will not be saved.
Since:
2.0.0
